website_summaries.verdict: A worthy investment if your child is serious about motocross racing, but it's pricey for its class and likely to end up in the shop frequently.
pros: This motorized bike is a good choice for kids with motocross experience, as it can go up to 17 mph and 40 minutes on a single charge
cons: On the higher end of the price scale
You'll likely benefit from purchasing the extended warranty, since durability issues including faulty chains, tires, and batteries are frequent after several months of use

customer_reviews.title: Right size for 10 yr olds and up
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 10-year-old. The reviews on the 350 and 500 models are absolutely correct; those are too small for the recommended age groups. The 650 is perfect, not only for my 4'10" kid, but even for grown-ups. It is so much fun, I'm resisting the urge to sneak ride it ... more. I was also worried about whether my kid could handle it because he's not particularly strong, but he tipped it over in the grass twice while learning, and since then has had no problems whatsoever. Love this thing! We're using a 12-hour timer switch ( to prevent overcharging, so we don't have to worry about killing the battery. Freakin' SWEET!
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: If I can just keep the kids from stealing it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Yes, I know it's a kids toy, but I bought it to haul my 6'3", 185 lb carcass around my six-acre worksite. I know I look ridiculous, but it is faster and more comfortable than those stupid stand up "hoverboards" everyone else is riding. The boss doesn't care that I ride it inside because it is electric. The front wheel is a little lopsided, but I will eventually fix it. My only other complaint is the seat is a little inadequate for the size of my rear end, but I expected that since this thing is made for 12 year-olds! Thanks to camelcamelcamel I got it for $350.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Fuller

customer_reviews.title: GREAT purchase!
customer_reviews.text: We've had this for nearly three years and it has been through the woods, mud, rocks, gravel, water - left out in the rain, sat through snowstorms and is still running quite well! We haven't had to replace anything - even the charger has held up wonderfully! Highly recommend as it's very durable for even the most damaging of little boys!
customer_reviews.author: SavvyShopper

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't seem to have much power at all up a slight Hill. Maybe for sale soon.
customer_reviews.text: Well I've only just now got it fully charged for 24 hours. It is sturdier then I thought it would be, heavier, and seems pretty ruggedly made. But just climbing a mild Hill in front of my house it doesn't do so well. I might have it for sale soon to someone with kids that lives on a flat subdivision. We will see. It just will not go up a hill with a hundred 40 lb man on it. A 5-degree hill. It is for kids only.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Beaty

customer_reviews.title: Died within a month.  Poor customer service.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on June 11 this year a little over a month ago. It already died. So I call razor and they are only open 9-5 m-Friday and I have to have the unit with me to honor the warranty. The charger died, and I can’t bring a motorcycle to work with me considering I actually work. So they will not help me with the warranty because I can’t call when I am with the bike itself. Ridiculous. They don’t speak English as a first language and it’s very hard to understand them. Very poor customer service. Very poor. I would not recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Is my other ride

customer_reviews.title: Broken wheel bearing
customer_reviews.text: I and my son were excited to get this bike for his birthday. I assembled (handle bars, front wheel, mud guard) and charged overnight so it would be ready for use. This came with a brake adjuster tool, which I inspected after assembly. This brought me to a different issue. The rear wheel bearing was dislodged and spilt grease out onto the chain drive wheel. I have sent an email and asked for replacement. Hopefully it will be resolved. Until then I have a bike my son cannot use for his birthday.
customer_reviews.author: Jos

customer_reviews.title: Go ahead, spoil your kid
customer_reviews.text: This little thing is great. A noiseless miniature dirt bike that doesn't travel at breakneck speeds, is well constructed and although expensive, not outrageous. My 7 year-old grandson loves it. He was riding it around as soon a I put the wheel and fender on out of the box. One star off for short battery life. Oh, if such a thing existed when I was a kid, but we had to PEDAL our darn bikes....
customer_reviews.author: Spiritwinds

customer_reviews.title: Good for older kids
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 9 year old. He is 90ish pounds and had wanted a ride-on for a long time. Most ride-ons are for smaller kids/toddlers and the weight limit would not work for him. This one fit the bill perfectly. It goes surprisingly fast for an electric ride-on. The charges lasts 45 minutes to an hour, which is just about the time he is usually ready to stop. It is very heavy. He has had a few wrecks on it, and there hasn't been any damage to the bike at all. It seems very well built. I'm pleased.
customer_reviews.author: EricaJo

customer_reviews.title: Great dirt bike.  Def would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this. He is 10 1/2 and 4 1/2 feet tall. 85 pounds. It’s simple to understand and use. He never rode a dirt bike before and he got on and that’s it. It runs longer than 45 minutes and still at good speed. He has a blast. I am 5’ and 155 pounds (shhhh) and I got on and not a problem. So much fun he has and he didn’t think mommy could do it. Please This mommy can do anything. Hope I do not have problems with it and if I had to buy it again knowing what I know I will. It’s made pretty dang good as well. Santa Claus did awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Jacqui75

customer_reviews.title: Be sure to check charging capability!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this bike for our son over a year ago for Christmas, and it worked well for about a month. We charged the battery, called for a replacement battery and other replacement parts for the charging port, over and over but nothing has worked. The bike will not recharge. It’s been almost 18 months and it’s been sitting, wasting space in our garage. Such a disappointment!
customer_reviews.author: JAKingston

customer_reviews.title: What a waste
customer_reviews.text: This thing was a disappointment. After my small sized 10 year old rode this twice the shock absorber broke from the swing arm. This also blew a fuse as the back wheel rubbed against the back fender. After waiting 10 days from razor to get the new shock, and replacing the fuse, the bike again stopped working minutes in to the next ride. Even though there appears to be a suspension, anything other than a flat smooth smooth surface will strain/break this thing. Unfortunately it is too late to return this heavy useless toy.
customer_reviews.author: Brett c.

customer_reviews.title: really cool
customer_reviews.text: the dirt bike is legit. very sturdy, a little tricky to assemble the last few pieces, but assembly is very limited. bike took off after assembly with no hitches, and my 12yr old loves it. Perfect size for him, and the speed of the bike is perfect. Not too fast, but fast enough to give him a thrill. I drove it also and loved it. the brakes work very well, but hardly needed since when you release the throttell, the bike basically stops. no issue mounting or dismounting for my close to 5' tall kid.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Keough

customer_reviews.title: Won’t work after two weeks Razor won’t fix or replace
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for Christmas last year and it worked for two weeks before it broke. Razor sent me a part and expected me to fix it. By the time I got the parts the 90 day warranty was expired. Still trying to get Razor to fix their product. Still sending parts almost year later. Don’t waste your money and break your kids heart. Nothing like buying your kid an expensive Christmas gift only to have it break two weeks later and the company won’t honor their product.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice machine for the little ones.
customer_reviews.text: It's a great machine, runs a long time. A bit heavy for the average 8 year old, but that's because the run time is long. Once they aren't trying to push it inside it's great. Nice speed. Suspension can be much better. Pros: -long run time -nice size -4' tall and feet can be down Cons: -Heavy (batteries) when moving around garage, but take the long run time every time -rear shock is pretty terrible. rebound is way off.
customer_reviews.author: Steven L.

customer_reviews.title: Rear hub failure
customer_reviews.text: This is the 9th razor electric scooter I have purchased for my kids and number 5 in the garage currently. I understand the issues these scooters face and repair them with new parts as needed. This is the nicest of any scooter I have purchased from razor. The rear hub failed after 32 days of ownership. The hub should not be a wear and tear item but due to poor design or manufacturing I am afraid it will be. I am super disappointed for the price.
customer_reviews.author: shawn taylor

customer_reviews.title: Super fun dirt bike!!
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old son had only one item on his Christmas list: a dirt bike. I worried about the noise a gas powered bike would make around our neighborhood. I was also very worried about how he would react to an electric bike. We had it all charged up and waiting under the tree. He was beyond excited and wanted to ride it immediately. All is well and he said, “best Christmas ever!” Later in the day - several charges later - all of the adults had fun taking turns on it. Everyone commented on how sturdy it felt. So far, the short battery life (usually 45 minutes or less) has the only drawback.
customer_reviews.author: M. Stephens

customer_reviews.title: This little motorcycle is surprisingly good for the price
customer_reviews.text: This electric motorcycle works really great! It has around 30 to 40 minutes of continuous run time before you need to recharge it. My 11 year old LOVES riding it, and uses it every day. The little electric motorcycle has not had ANY problems, and is built extremely well for the price. The motorcycle has a surprising amount of torque and power, and can even get underway with my 250 lbs on it (although not as fast as when my 11 year old is on it). It has brought my kid a lot of joy, and was definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Happy Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Soo Much Fun! Tons of Aftermarket
customer_reviews.text: Another great Razor product. Well built! The mx650 can be found @ Walmart for $620. However, keep an eye out for Amazon deal; got this one here for $410! These bikes are easily customizable for a little additional $ which increases speed, distance, and control. Great starter bike for kids and adults even enjoy riding the modified 48v one. See some on YouTube @ 72v. Next I'll be swapping to 2000w motor. Make sure to find it @ the right price, but stock available on these things varies all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna & Mike

customer_reviews.title: Falls apart-avoid!
customer_reviews.text: Everything keeps falling apart. We have been buying parts, chain tension rods, tire tubes, etc since the 2nd week of using it. Amazon won't take it back or exchange it because it's outside of 90 days. WASTE of $500
customer_reviews.author: JGroza

customer_reviews.title: IT MAKES A POPPING SOUND IN THE FRONT SHOCK
customer_reviews.text: IT APPEARS THAT THE FONT SHOCK ISNT ANY GOOD. IT POPS THE WHOLE TIME RIDING. WE HAVE HAD THIS A FEW DAYS AND ALREADY HAVING ISSUES. ALSO THE BATTERIES DIDNT CHARGE UP WITH FULL CAPACITY. IT SHOWED GREEN LIGHT ON CHARGER AFTER FOLLOWING THE INSTRUCTIONS ON INITIAL CHARGE BUT DOESNT HOLD MORE THAN 10 MINUTES. SUPPOSED TO GO 40 min?!! Our son is 11 and weighs 100lbs, so this shouldn't be an issue either. ANY SUGGESTIONS?????????????
customer_reviews.author: Kim Ridenour

customer_reviews.title: Our son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a present for my 9 year old and he loves it. Packaging was great and shipping was sword (thanks prime). Assembly took approx 1 hour with the provided tools. It fits him like a regular dirt bike and he can grow into it. It does a great job on hills and grass. It's very torkey right up till that 17 mph range. Several adults have also given it a ride or to including myself and they get off with smiles. It slows down when the weight is over 150.
customer_reviews.author: Gil

customer_reviews.title: Works fine after fixing switch
customer_reviews.text: Found that ignition switch had bad contacts, Bike charged just fine and now it works as expected so far.
customer_reviews.author: SSeiichii

customer_reviews.title: Golden Arizona Deals is amazing
customer_reviews.text: The bike is all it says it is but it’s the company Golden Arizona Deals that deserves the stars. Their customer service is the best I have ever experienced from a vendor and I can’t say enough great words about them. Esmeralda is amazing and one of the most genuine people I’ve had the pleasure working with. I love them and will do business with them again. It’s rare in this day to find someone like her and the company Golden Arizona Deals and as I stated the bike is a blast and the quality is second to none. It has power and is not only for the kids lol.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph S.

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: It’s a lot of fun. Bought for my 11 y/o. Loves it. He has only had a pedal bike before. Was able to ride it instantly. He can’t wait to ride it. I took for ride myself. It’s fun. Helpful to have 2 people to put front wheel on. I was able to do it with my 11 y/o. The rest is easy to set up. Only had a week so didn’t comment on battery. We got the 650 and glad we did. Hopefully will use it for couple years. I just hope he will still ride his pedal bike sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: kristy berardelli

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than you think
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this along with the X250 to ride with my son. The bike is pretty decent but smaller than you think. It sits maybe 2.5 ft off the ground. So far it is pretty fun to ride. Indeed is 17mph as i pass my son at max speed on his X250. The packaging needs to get better as my box was really beat up. Cannot speak on the battery life but it did hold its charge for a 2 mile ride.
customer_reviews.author: Trusted-Reviews

customer_reviews.title: ... 7 Year old Loves it and it is a Perfect size for him
customer_reviews.text: This Bike is Awesome--Great Look--Great Feel--Great Brakes--Moves and Maneuvers Good--My 7 Year old Loves it and it is a Perfect size for him! My Recommendation for anyone who is going to buy a Bike for the Kid--Get the 650 if there 6 or Older as they will have no problem riding it and they will grow into it and should be good thru 8-9 years of age before going bigger--My son is riding it so good now after only a week of getting it!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Scott Dobbins

customer_reviews.title: Chain broke
customer_reviews.text: The chain broke the first day we got it. My son rode for maybe 2 hours at the most. Part is pretty cheap but for the price we paid for the bike the chain should not have broken so easily and quickly
customer_reviews.author: Tonya

customer_reviews.title: ok; not much other options
customer_reviews.text: My son has this for more than a year; still works; the chain/gear started to become very noisy (even after lubrication); does not seem to be super well-built. for $500 I expect this to be better. Wish they make similar stuff in the US.
customer_reviews.author: iajarmeh

customer_reviews.title: Died after 2 uses and will not charge.
customer_reviews.text: Spent a bunch of money on this totally useless bike. It will not charge after 2 uses and I cannot contact Razor's customer support. Their bogus phone number sends you on an endless loop of numbers to press. Unable to get someone despite multiple tries. Very disappoint in this company. The bike, when working, was pretty cool but very small for the recommended age range. Would not recommend Razor products due to total lack of customer support.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: The boys love it
customer_reviews.text: This is great. My 9 yr old son really loves this. It is heavy so must have kids use with caution. So far no issues for my 11 and 9 yr old. Since my husband was on work travel my younger son was nagging me to get it set up. Wasnt sure I could set it up but I did and it was super easy coming from a person that did not want to ruin a fresh manicure. I got on and did test ride before giving the boys and it was fast and fun.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon_customer

customer_reviews.title: Power and great battery longevity
customer_reviews.text: Where Do I begin, yes, this bike is well worth the money. Power and great battery longevity. I had a scare, I left mine out in the rain overnight on accident and it wouldn't power on after having it for a full year. Was on the edge of clicking the buy button for another one, but I took some screws out, jiggled some wires and it powered back on. These things are indestructible. Would buy it again and again. I have a buddy that is about 260, I put some extra air in the tires and he cruised around for an hour with no problems! Don't be on the edge. BUY IT!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mason B.

customer_reviews.title: HUGE Junk!
customer_reviews.text: My son has had this less than 30 days and we've already experienced TWO issues. First, the charger broke after the FIRST week. It took nearly 2 weeks to get a replacement. Now, the chain tension spring broke, again rendering the bike useless. My son is riding this in a neighborhood, on concrete or asphalt. It's hardly getting any wear and tear. It's an absolute piece of junk. (And when it does work, the battery lasts an hour at most, and then it's back on the charger for 12!).
customer_reviews.author: Audrey McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Great bike!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My son absolutely loves this bike and I love it because it's so quiet. We live in a neighborhood of older folks and having them keep their quiet street is such a bonus. And it's fast!!! Love it
customer_reviews.author: M. Zepka

customer_reviews.title: Break issue
customer_reviews.text: Breaks already malfunctioning after 4 rides. Have not had time to try to handle with the company. Once the breaks have been used on a ride they don’t release properly so the bike will barely re-accelerate.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One day old - broken chain
customer_reviews.text: My son had this bike for one day and the chain broke! He is 7 yrs old and under 60 lbs. Razor is sending new chain. I will see if that works or I will return this item.
customer_reviews.author: Big Fech

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: This was one of the best things I've ever bought. I got this for my 12 year old son and he loves it. A little small though. I would say the age range for this is 8-12 maybe 13 or 14 depending on the size of your child. Lots of fun and fast. It's very fast and powerful. But definitely not too powerful. Especially in open spaces. I wish they would make a bigger/more powerful version like a mx800 or something. But overall this was a great purchase and very fun. When we got ours there was a crack in the frame but we called razor a they will be replacing it.
customer_reviews.author: christian sommer

customer_reviews.title: Glad I got the larger size
customer_reviews.text: I’m so thankful I read reviews and went for the larger bike ! We got this one for my son who just turned 8 . He’s been asking for a dirt bike for over a year now . It’s amazing! Perfect starter bike and perfect bike to learn on . A little heavy but he learned really fast how to right it himself . We didn’t want to spend a ton of money on a gas bike until we knew he was going to stay interested so this is a great starter. I imagine if he sticks with it we will be going to a gas one pretty quickly but still worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Recommended buy
customer_reviews.text: I waited a while until posting so the review could be helpful. I bought this for my daughter 2 years ago when she was 6. She has rode it fairly consistently and the bike (and battery) is still running strong. The battery even seems to last a lot longer than expected. We do keep it up though. After she rides it we clean it with a hose and do not charge it unless the battery is really low.
customer_reviews.author: Co

customer_reviews.title: Great when it works
customer_reviews.text: This little bike started off good but when it gets too hot after driving for only about 15 minutes, it just slows to a crawl and eventually quits even though the charge is still green. The fork packing already came apart so Razor did a good job replacing the fork assembly without any trouble. They had excellent customer service but it was a real pain to change the forks out and get the brakes dialed back it so they wouldn't squeak all the time. For these troubles, this bike has lost favor with the kids really quick. Time will tell on the reliability of the battery system.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product and built well! Razor makes products that are worth your money and last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Dan2131

customer_reviews.title: Great fro 8-10 year olds
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect introduction bike for a 8-10 year old. My son loves it, and the battery lasts. I would recommend
customer_reviews.author: The Price Family

customer_reviews.title: Best robust electric bike.
customer_reviews.text: We've had this MX650 for 3 months and my kids put it through the ringer, the battery run time lasts for nearly two hours. The MX650 is a robust bike for off-roading for my kids.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Bike
customer_reviews.text: What can I say. I think I have as much fun as the kid. If you don't want a noisy gas bike this should fill the void. Does OK off road but probably won't be doing any stunts. It gets him around the subdivision and keeps up with the other kids.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Kramer

customer_reviews.title: Poor shipping container
customer_reviews.text: Bike is HEAVY. Shipping box is not sturdy enough for the weight of of the product to be shipped in. Took 3 attempts to get one that wasn't damaged in transit.
customer_reviews.author: T.N.

customer_reviews.title: The bike is solid and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: My son really enjoys this bike. He just turned 9 and it fits him perfect. He should be able to easy ride this for a few years then i will buy him a gas 4-wheeler then eventually a gas motorcycle in his early teens. That's just my approach as a father and the way i'm going to progressively fade him in this process. This bike is the perfect speed for him to ride in the open field , side walks and some open recreational parking lot streets when monitored. My son weighs 85 pounds and he handles it very well. Hope this helps your decision if your thinking the same.
customer_reviews.author: William Jones

customer_reviews.title: Power on and go
customer_reviews.text: Prefect for my grandson easy to install well packed. It’s a great bike enjoy daily better than a gas one .
customer_reviews.author: Rodney West

customer_reviews.title: Easy to ride and maneuver
customer_reviews.text: WOW! My son absolutely loves his Razor MX650 Dirt Rocket Electric Motocross Bike!! It holds up to everything that this seller has described. The plastic is hard & durable. The bike is a quiet and smooth ride. It holds up to its weight limit and a little more. With a full charge my son can get 8 hours out of it. We clocked him doing 18mph on it with him weighing 95 pounds. Easy to ride and maneuver.
customer_reviews.author: mom2-4

customer_reviews.title: My son is seven years old and weighs 110 pounds solid boy very tall this fits him great very happy with my purchase and very hap
customer_reviews.text: I Purchased this off Amazon we had the razor bike MX 350 & My son outgrew it so we bought the MX 650, My son is seven years old and weighs 110 pounds solid boy very tall this fits him great very happy with my purchase and very happy with the razor products
customer_reviews.author: Schemickia Crosby

customer_reviews.title: Best electric mini bike out there
customer_reviews.text: Quiet, fun, fast, sturdy, and easy to use. Handles grass quite well and has very decent shock absorbing capabilities. Great for pavement or some off roading. I love driving this through the fields and private land. It feels solid and very capable of handling larger riders. Got my friend to paint it since I don't like yellow but other then that it's totally stick and I couldn't be happier with it's performance and value.
customer_reviews.author: Louis

customer_reviews.title: 2 years and still going strong.  We love it
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe I hadn't written a review yet. This bike is awesome! Plenty of speed for my 10 yr old and it holds a charge really really well. It's been ridden every nice day for about 2 years now and we've had zero issues.
customer_reviews.author: jeannetteb

customer_reviews.title: This bike is perfect size and power for him
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son's 7th birthday. He is 48 inches tall and around 50 pounds. This bike is perfect size and power for him. It took him all of 10 mintues to understand the trottle/hand break concept. After a week of riding he is handling the bike like a pro. This bike is very suitable for a 7+ older child. They should not have any problem with the height or weight or power. Don't go for the smaller 250 they will out grow in a months time. A full charge on the battery last several hours of use. My son is usually tired of riding before the battery is completely drained.
customer_reviews.author: David Gomes

customer_reviews.title: Buy the extended warranty!! Doesn't hold up great on trails
customer_reviews.text: My child hit a pothole in the grass and the metal wheel bent. (under warranty, received new wheel) Second time the motorcycle chain would not work so the motorcycle can not move forward. I would suggest this be used on pavement only as usage in the grass & field the motorcycle doesn't hold up well. Disappointed because I purchased this for trail use. (using warranty, not sure of outcome yet)
customer_reviews.author: R S

customer_reviews.title: We bought 3 of these dirt bikes... all of them don't work or came damaged. Don't BUY!!
customer_reviews.text: We bought 3 of these dirt bikes... all of them don't work or came damaged. It has been a complete Nightmare to deal with Razor... they don't send replace parts until you call over and over again.... then there are massive delays in getting bikes fixed or parts sent to fix them. If you want to throw your money away on these terrible Razor dirt bikes, be prepared to be bummed.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Already broken
customer_reviews.text: My son comes in tonight to tell me that he went thru a mud puddle in our apartment complex, so he washed his bike off, and now it doesn't work. The lights come on, but bike motor doesn't engage. What do I do now. He has only ridden this bike 3 times, since he has been at his mothers house. So did I spend $400 on a "Dirt Bike", that cannot get wet?
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Dodson

customer_reviews.title: Quiet for neighborhoods, best gift ever!
customer_reviews.text: This bike is awesome and it’s perfect for my 9 year old. The smaller version is too small. He rides it all over our neighborhood and the battery typically gets charged at the end of the day. I couldn’t be happier with it.
customer_reviews.author: D. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great for 8-12 year olds
customer_reviews.text: Merry Christmas to my 9 yr old. He loved it. I even took it for a ride and thought it was fun. Very easy to put together and charge. Prefect to ride in I’m the neighborhood and it’s quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun to ride !
customer_reviews.text: The battery life is fantastic & it was the top Christmas gift for my grandson!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bike to get around.
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't be more fun! I'm 6'2" and 220 pounds and I ride it around campsites. I've even put my 50 pound daughter on with me and it still runs, though I wouldn't suggest that. Not too fast, great power and brakes, really fun at campsites and very quiet!
customer_reviews.author: Stock Trader

customer_reviews.title: This bike is awesome! My son who is 9
customer_reviews.text: This bike is awesome! My son who is 9, 70 lbs loves it. It's very easy to put together, charge and manouver. I myself ride the bike to the bus stop so my son can ride it home. I'm 125 lb and it still rides great. Just an amazing product!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Krous

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Never really worked like it should . We charge the battery but after 5 minutes of riding the bike stops . We took it to the tec support provided by the co but it still hasn’t resolved the issue . What a waste of money it’s piece of junk . Don’t buy it or waste your money .
customer_reviews.author: Naaa

customer_reviews.title: Bad brakes
customer_reviews.text: Brakes however are garbage. Easy to adjust but the adjustments don’t fix the problem. Disc is always catching the pad. For the price hydraulic would’ve been much better than a mechanical brake. Overall very sturdy. Bike can’t handle grass hills though
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: While the Pocket Mod is cute and fun, this MX650 dirt bike is in a different ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought this and a Razor Pocket Mod to replaced a couple of old electric scooters for my 14 and 12 yr old daughters. While the Pocket Mod is cute and fun, this MX650 dirt bike is in a different class. It is and feels much faster. It jerks you back and pulls well when accelerating. It is also very rugged and seems well built. We (yes me too) have been just riding in our culdesac and I am sure it would be a lot of fun riding on dirt roads even though we have no plan to do so. I highly recomment this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: son loves it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 9 year old son. He loves it. Assembly wasn't bad at all. It has been fun for him. He's really put it to test and it's held up great. He only wishes the battery would last longer. But it does charge back up quickly and he's riding again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am very glad I did because it's not very big
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our 8year old son. He is very tall, so I wanted to get him this bigger version. I am very glad I did because it's not very big. With that said, the battery has held its charge and he is super psyched about it. If you are on the fence between the 650 and the smaller versions, go with this one. Also, invest in a proper helmet - we did a motocross one and not just a regular bike helmet. He's riding it on the sidewalk, which is way different (and I think faster than on the grass)
customer_reviews.author: yoga momma

customer_reviews.title: Love the electric because its nearly silent
customer_reviews.text: Bought for grandson, Christmas 2017, he loves it. He is 7 year old with a 24" inseam. This bike works perfectly. Love the electric because its nearly silent. I was concern the brakes would require too much pressure for a kid to use...but the squeeze required to stop the bike is good for kids. Plus the electric motor helps slow the bike. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: scott h.

customer_reviews.title: Kid loves it
customer_reviews.text: Great electric kids motorcycle. My 12 yr. Old loves it.
customer_reviews.author: big-del1

customer_reviews.title: The boys love them. Plus they can go all over bike ...
customer_reviews.text: These things are the future of motorcycles. The boys love them. Plus they can go all over bike paths and even ride them to school. All the benefits of a motorcycle but no restrictions. Long battery life too. Both of my boys have this model and went 4 miles away and returned with good battery.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Vroom Vroom!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son for Christmas and he absolutely loves it. My husband even at times takes it for a ride. It is exactly as depicted in the photos.
customer_reviews.author: Chantel

customer_reviews.title: The razor dirt bike that doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Only worked one day on Christmas Called razor support no help I’m stuck with a $589 dirt bike that doesn’t work. My son Christmas gift ruin his Christmas Please will someone from razor or amazon help The millers
customer_reviews.author: cela

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase - dependable FUN bikes!
customer_reviews.text: We bought 2 of these & they have, hands down, been one of our favorite purchases for our four kids! They are sturdy, allowing even our 15 & 17 year olds to ride them & their battery charge is great! We had a tire go flat the very first week & discovered Razor actually put the wrong size tube in the tire. Easy $7.00 tube replacement & fix, but good to know in case the others go flat as well! They haven’t so far. I’d definitely give these bikes 5 stars! So much fun!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Warrick

customer_reviews.title: This has been a great dirtbike so far
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great dirtbike so far. My intentions in going with electric over gas power was to teach my daughter the basics. It's helping her learn and it carries me just fine at 185lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Everything ATV UTV Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Razor MX650 Dirt Rocket Electric Motocross...
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a birthday gift for my 13 years old son. He loves it so much. Now he and his friend cruise the neighborhood.
customer_reviews.author: VLADIMIR B STRULEV

customer_reviews.title: 2 years old and still running
customer_reviews.text: It has already been 2 years, second kid now driving it around in dirt, bumps and jumps...All in order, nothing fell off, battery still working well (although I take the bike in the basement in the cold winter months)
customer_reviews.author: eric CDN

customer_reviews.title: Great first bike for 9 year old.
customer_reviews.text: 9 year old son loves it. His first dirt bike. Great to ride in the back yard and trails without the 2 stroke noise.
customer_reviews.author: Robert D

customer_reviews.title: 13 year old brother used this to go everywhere for ...
customer_reviews.text: 13 year old brother used this to go everywhere for almost the entire summer. After a couple of months one of the tires needed to be replaced. And then the bike was stolen...
customer_reviews.author: Don't Follow Me

customer_reviews.title: Fast, fun, and long lasting. Must have
customer_reviews.text: This little bike is awesome. I literally rode it on the streets of Brooklyn NY for about 7.2 miles. And thought it would die out after arriving to my destination and this little bike went for a extra 2 hours. It's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Randy M.

customer_reviews.title: Big enough for the whole family to ride.
customer_reviews.text: My 8 and 10 year old boys love this bike and it has enough power for me to ride it too.
customer_reviews.author: Blair

customer_reviews.title: My 8 year old loves this bike!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for this for my 8 year old son as a birthday present, he absolutely loves it! Such a cool toy, and the perfect size for him (he's about 50 inches tall). All his friends in the neighborhood are jealous of it!
customer_reviews.author: Nozama

customer_reviews.title: Battery problems
customer_reviews.text: I would like someone to contact me on this razor. We have had issues with the battery since the beginning. It shuts down when ever and it says it’s fully charged and runs really slow. Not sure but at this point 6 months after buying it my son can no longer enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth ponce

customer_reviews.title: Great first bike
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old loves this bike! Great starter bike. Goes just fast enough. Has pretty good torque. Very quiet running.
customer_reviews.author: Pierre Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: yello dirt bike
customer_reviews.text: This is a great Dirt bike. my grandson loves it. I sure wish that it came in other colors so that I could purchase another one for my grand daughter. With kids they all like different colors and they also like to have something different then their siblings that are of a different color. I have looked everywhere and this is the only color for the MX650.
customer_reviews.author: Nida

customer_reviews.title: The bike works fine but the front fender came broken
customer_reviews.text: The bike works fine but the front fender came broken, snapped somewhere in the process. Very disappointing to have happen because i hate to return such an item because it works and my son wants to ride it badly but I also paid over $400 and expect an item in mint condition.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Criscone

customer_reviews.title: Great little bike.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves zipping around the neighborhood and fields with his new bike. Has good power to even move me at 6’ 180 pounds.
customer_reviews.author: Chris K

customer_reviews.title: My kids have loved this! Its perfect for our family
customer_reviews.text: My kids have loved this! Its perfect for our family. My kids ride around the neighborhood and have lots of fun. We have not had any problems with the battery or battery life. We will most likely be purchasing another one sometime soon.
customer_reviews.author: Cami Fountaine

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun!
customer_reviews.text: We got this for my 8 year old son for his birthday. He had outgrown his smaller motorized bike. This is perfect! My son is tall - he’s 55” tall and weighs 90 pounds. He loves this thing! It’s a perfect size for him!
customer_reviews.author: M. Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Powerful
customer_reviews.text: This bike is built well. Got it for my 8yr old (4’6” 60lbs) and he loves it. This bike even moves me around (5’9” 175lbs). It was very easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Courey

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Purchased for my son's 10th Bday
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Purchased for my son's 10th Bday. He is loving it and I have to tell ya, so am I. Bike came missing fender bolt (sourced one at local hardware store) and with a deformed front tire. I emailed Razor and they were quick to respond with a solution to send me the proper bolt and a new front tire, met my expectations. Great company, awesome product for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: VERY, VERY STURDY BIKE FOR RAZOR... NOT THE LOW QUALITY YOU OFTEN GET WITH RAZOR
customer_reviews.text: Brought this for my son. Was concerned because of some bad reviews on other sites, but it has performed extremely well. A solidly built electric bike and the best part I got it on sale during Amazon Prime Day.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Y. Natal

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 10 year old. He absolutely loves it!!!!! It was a huge hit on Christmas morning!
customer_reviews.author: Lboyd

customer_reviews.title: Nice Bike!
customer_reviews.text: So far...so good.....My 12 yr old son loves it.....thought bike would be too small for a 12 yr old but no....it’s perfect...recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: A fun and sturdy little dirt bike.
customer_reviews.text: My 13 year old son loves it. He had never ridden a dirt bike before, so the slower speed suited him fine. Even his 43 year old Dad has been known to hop on it from time to time. It is super quiet, allowing it to be ridden on our property in the suburbs.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: good electric motorcycle
customer_reviews.text: Seems ok so far, only had for a month. Followed directions took about an hour to build, son loves it.
customer_reviews.author: P. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Fun,fun.fun!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bike is perfect for my Grandsons ages 6 & 5. Neither one of them had rode a bicycle without training wheels. They hopped on their dirt bike and never looked back. Battery stays charged for a long time. The bike is heavy though and they need help picking it up if they fall. Can't go wrong with this bike!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do research before you buy
customer_reviews.text: Battery never says it is completely charged when we got but it worked. Now it does not hold a charge. When it worked it was as fast as they said and my son liked to ride it. It is a big paper weight now
customer_reviews.author: Elton Tabon

customer_reviews.title: I read the reviews and I have to say that this bike is perfect for a young rider
customer_reviews.text: Ok, I read the reviews and I have to say that this bike is perfect for a young rider! The chain tensioner did break after a month or so and we have had to replace a few tubes but parts were readily available so the repair was fast and inexpensive. If the chain is falling off it is probably the chain tensioner.. Mahalo!
customer_reviews.author: BRIAN PETERS

customer_reviews.title: Great product lots of fun!
customer_reviews.text: So glad I went ahead and got the 650 rather than the 500 for my 9 year old grandson. He hopped on and took off like he had ridden one before. The 7 year old had no problem riding it after a little practice but it's a little heavy for my petite 6 year old granddaughter. She is able to ride it but has a hard time right now making turns. The bike has endured being dropped on it's side a couple of times - no injuries. Even the adult kids enjoy taking a turn.
customer_reviews.author: C.G.

customer_reviews.title: ... charge long its made strong and safe I'm very happy with
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves it I bought it for him to replace the smaller one he had that he lost when we lost everything when our home burned down the smile on his face was worth every penny I spent he loves it holds the charge long its made strong and safe I'm very happy with it
customer_reviews.author: patty

customer_reviews.title: Razor 650 comparison.
customer_reviews.text: I have owned the 500 version, and I cannot tell any difference in torque, or speed the 650 has over the 500. They use the exact same batteries, and the mere 150 watts isn't noticeable, so unless you really need the small increase in weight capacity, save the money and get the 500.
customer_reviews.author: johnny kirkland

customer_reviews.title: Good bike, charger broke 2nd day
customer_reviews.text: Bike is great. I’m 200lbs and it carries me fine. Only problem the charger broke the second day I had the bike. Can’t return just the charger so I had to buy a replacement online for $40
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great item!!!
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year son loves this bike. The fact that adults can ride it too is a huge plus! High recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Brigets

product_meta.title: Razor MX650 Rocket Electric Motocross Bike
feature_bullets: Compact electric motocross bike with powerful 650-watt electric motor
Carries riders at speeds of up to 17 mph; authentic dirt bike frame geometry
Dual suspension and riser handlebars deliver smooth, comfortable ride. Battery life Up to 40 mins
Pneumatic knobby tires for maximum power transfer; quiet variable-speed, chain-driven motor and Wheels- 16 inches front and 14 inches rear tires

Recommended for ages 16 and older (220-pound weight limit); 90-day warranty . Initial charge time: 12 hours.Failure to recharge the battery at least once a month may result in a battery that will no longer accept a charge.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
